content: उपपदं {@--1@} A word prefixed or previously uttered; धनुरुपपदं वेदं <ls>Ki. 18. 44</ls> (धनुर्वेदं); तस्याः स राजोपपदं निशांतं <ls>R. 16. 40.</ls> {@--2@} A title, a degree; epithet of respect, such as आर्य, शर्मन्; कथं निरुपपदमेव चाणक्यमिति न आर्यचाणक्यमिति <ls>Mu. 3.</ls> {@--3@} A secondary word of a sentence, a preposition, particle &c. prefixed to a verb or a noun derived from a verb which determines or qualifies the sense of the verb; उपपदमतिङ् <ls>P. II. 2. 19</ls>; (see <ls>Sk.</ls> thereon). °तत्पुरुषः a kind of <ab>Tat.</ab> <ab>comp.</ab> in which the last member is some form of a verbal character; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} वेदविद्, ग्रामणी, आकर्णलंबिन् &c.
